description: A successful job search requires a strategic approach, a compelling resume, and effective networking. It's a proactive process of finding the right fit for your skills and ambitions.
sentences: Tailor your resume and cover letter for each job application.
A strong LinkedIn profile is your digital resume and networking tool.
Networking is key; many job openings are filled through referrals.
Prepare thoroughly for interviews by researching the company and practicing common questions.
The job search process can be long; stay persistent and positive.
dos: Customize your application for each role.
Network actively, both online and offline.
Follow up after applications and interviews.
Prepare thoughtful questions to ask the interviewer.
donts: Don't use a generic, one-size-fits-all resume.
Don't lie or exaggerate on your resume.
Avoid speaking negatively about past employers.
Don't neglect to send a thank-you note after an interview.
